sections.heading: Correction to: Zinc Oxide Nanoparticles Boost the Immune Responses
sections.text:
in Oreochromis niloticus and Improve Disease Resistance to Aeromonas hydrophila Infection

Correction to: Biological Trace Element Research https://doi.org/10.1007/s12011-022-03183-w
The original version of this article unfortunately contained a mistake. The affiliation of Mohamed Abdelsalam is now updated with the email address added in the pdf.
The original article has been corrected.
Publisher’s Note Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
The online version of the original article can be found at https:// doi. org/ 10. 1007/ s12011- 022- 03183-w
